name: Dubstep Dubpad - Audio Music Sample Maker
name_original: Dubstep Dubpad - Audio Music Sample Maker
description:
Dubstep DubPad is so easy that anyone can create amazing live Dubstep Music!

Create powerful dubstep beats by simply touching pads that support 11 different touches.

45 different sounds available including: basslines, drum loops, one shots, sound fx and synths.

In our newest version we added an auto loop feature which will allow you to stop having to push so many buttons at once.

A two-touch design allows you to conveniently color organize sounds, making your dubpad distinct.

A quick comment for anyone struggling to produce sound on the DubPad: please make sure your MUTE button is in the correct position (the button on your ipad above your volume controls.)

Enjoy.

Email us with any comments: fusionaffect@yahoo.com
